import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home-page', templateUrl: './home-page.component.html' }) export class HomePageComponent {}

NorthStar Advisory Services

Internal client information portal for advisors, compliance analysts, and operations teams. This version uses an Angular front end and a Node/Express API backed by MongoDB.

Open Client Directory
Consistent Interface

Shared navigation, layout, and visual standards across all screens.

Operational Data

Client records are persisted in MongoDB and retrieved via REST APIs.

CRUD Workflow

Create, update, and manage clients with validation and error handling.
